definition: power/exponent (math.)/to cover with a cloth/cloth cover/veil
the power of a number (square, cube etc)/to exponentiate (math.)

sentences.english: In the end we prove that idempotent operator is similar to its adjoint.
sentences.chinese: 最后还证明了幂等算子和它的伴随是相似的。

sentences.english: A associative ring R is called a regular ring if every left principle ideal of it is generated by an idempotent.
sentences.chinese: 每一个主左理想均由一个幂等元生成的环叫正则环。

sentences.english: The first question is to raise 4 to the third power.
sentences.chinese: 第一道题是使4自乘到三次幂。

sentences.english: The relationship between the order M of the exponential series function and astringency was also analyzed.
sentences.chinese: 分析了幂数级函数阶数M与其收敛性的关系。

sentences.english: In a word , we can get all the generators of power integral bases under equivalent.
sentences.chinese: 从而在等价的意义下找到了所有的幂元整基。

sentences.english: This article discussed the nilpotent matrix related nature from the matrix different angle.
sentences.chinese: 本文从矩阵的不同角度讨论了幂零矩阵的相关性质。

sentences.english: "M1 power" from a foreign language school, the end to test Russian.
sentences.chinese: “m1幂”来自某校外语专业，期末要考俄语。

sentences.english: In mathematics, a function in which a constant Base is raised to a variable power.
sentences.chinese: 数学中的一种函数，其中的常数基被提升到变量幂。

sentences.english: Established the landform model by distance power inverse ratio method and fractal interpolation algorithm.
sentences.chinese: 利用距离幂反比法加分形插值算法建立了地形模型。

sentences.english: This paper deals with orthodox semirings whose additive idempotents satisfy permutation identities.
sentences.chinese: 本文主要研究加法幂等元满足置换等式的纯整半环。

sentences.english: In this note, a characterization of the graded nilpotent radical of general group graded rings was established.
sentences.chinese: 本文给出了一般群分次环的分次幂零根的一个刻划。

sentences.english: The nilpotency about the symplectic ternary algebra is discussed in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 研究的是辛三代数的幂零性。

sentences.english: Then we study the idempotent-separating congruences on the orthogroups with group kernel normal systems and give it a simple rep.
sentences.chinese: 利用群核正规系讨论了纯正群的幂等元分离同余。

sentences.english: The third power of a number or quantity.
A method for constructing orthonormalized eigenstates of annihilation operator b 3 - of a non harmonic is presented.
sentences.chinese: 构造了非简谐振子湮灭算符3次幂的正交归一本征态。

sentences.english: where the E stands for the words times 10 to the power.
